attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: on a visit to the USA I was very impressed with the treatment of the armed forces, at all venues I visited I found a stand just for the armed forces, they get discounts on all maner of things, the USA are proud of the armed forces and show it, they fly the flag and it is am honour to do so. we in this country are afraid to be patriotic for fear that we will be branded racist or upset people from other countrys I AM BRITISH AND PROUD TO BE< so please, sir with respect, give us somthing to shout about and be proud, we are fast becoming the minority in our own country, so many people have the same views but are afraid of public expresion.
